==Trivia==
{{Rsn|紋章牽制R3|Goad Atk/Spd R 3}}
** Hliðskjálf is the first {{Wtt|Colorless Staff}} to get it's own personal refine skill.
{{NorseMyth|is the high seat of the god Odin allowing him to see into all realms. In other words, it is Odin's throne.}}
** In the context of {{FE|H}} this corresponds with {{Wt|Valaskjálf}}, the tome used by {{Ht|???: Masked Knight}}, which is named after Odin's throne room.
** {{Ut|Veronica: Brave Princess}} may be referencing her weapon's namesake in one of her castle quotes, where she comments on the distance she can see from atop her horse.<ref>{{RefQuote|From the back of a horse, you can see far into the distance... Do you want to ride with me?|{{Ut|Veronica: Brave Princess}}}}</ref>
